channel.title: Bitmaps
channel.description:
how do would you write the code so that it says to wait until bitmap is found.
I tried
[code]repeat wait(10) until(findbitmap(Dicearoo_rollbutton, x, y))[/code]
but that doesnt work, plz help im trying to use this to wait until the webpage is loaded. And if theres a better way then looking for the bitmap plz tell me

item.title: Bitmaps
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

If what The Un-Named says doesn’t work, then I’m guessing it’s your bitmap that’s the problem. Make sure your bitmaps are small, but still unique. If you need help with bitmaps, take a look at Kane’s Bitmap Tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Bitmaps
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

repeat
wait(10)
until(findbitmap(Dicearoo_rollbutton, x, y))

That will work.

Read full topic
